response.explain: The execution error indicates that the oven is already open, so the action to open the oven is unnecessary. The original subtask plan did not consider the initial state of the oven, which was already open. Therefore, the plan needs to be revised to remove the unnecessary step of opening the oven.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Put the pie in the oven.
(7) Close the oven.
(8) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
